channel.title: brms on INBO Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in brms on INBO Tutorials

item.title: Tutorial Bayesian statistics with brms
item.description: In the fall of 2023, a tutorial on Bayesian statistics with the brms packages was organised at INBO. Before you start the tutorial, please follow the instructions in this R script to install brms properly. All course material can be found in Dutch and English on the following pages: The English tutorial with all course material to test the examples yourself. The Dutch tutorial with all course material to test the examples yourself.
